Detailed Steps: empty state) load with correct testIds and are visible.

column9: Positive
column10: Navigation
column11:
> Navigation to LMS Requests Page
> Navigate to the LMS module landing page
> Locate the Requests menu/tab
> Click the Requests tab
> Wait for the LMS Requests page to load fully (wait for 2000 ms)
> Page Component Validation
> Validate the root container is visible: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-page")
> Validate the main wrapper is rendered: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-main-wrapper")
> Validate the header section loads: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-header")
> Validate header content: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-header-content")
> Validate banner section: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-banner")
> Validate collection banner component: page.getByTestId("collection-banner")
> Validate banner heading: page.getByTestId("collection-banner-heading")
> Verify banner heading text contains "LMS" and "Requests"
> Validate search filter wrapper: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-filter-wrapper")
> Validate search filter component: page.getByTestId("lms-search-filter")
> Validate main content area: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-main-content")
> Validate content wrapper: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-content-wrapper")
> Validate table section: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-table-section")
> Empty State Validation
> Verify empty state is displayed when no center is selected: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-empty-state")
> Verify empty state content: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-empty-content")
> Verify empty state icon: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-empty-icon")
> Verify empty state title: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-empty-title")
> Verify empty state title text is "Select a Center"
> Verify empty state subtitle: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-empty-subtitle")
> Verify empty state subtitle text contains "Please select a center"

column15: and all required testIds are present. No UI breaks or missing components.

Title: Verify Collection Banner displays correct heading and subheading text.
Description: Validate that the CollectionBanner component displays the correct heading ""LMS"" and subheading ""Requests"" with proper formatting and arrow separator.
Detailed Steps:
> Navigate to LMS Requests page
> Wait for page to load (wait for 2000 ms)

> Validate banner heading element: page.getByTestId("collection-banner-heading")
> Verify heading text contains "LMS"
> Verify heading text contains "Requests"
> Verify arrow icon is displayed between heading and subheading
> Verify banner is visible and properly styled
Expected Result: CollectionBanner displays ""LMS > Requests"" correctly. Heading and subheading are visible with arrow separator icon. Banner is properly styled and positioned in the header section.

Title: Verify center dropdown opens and displays available centers.

> Wait for dropdown to open (wait for 500 ms)

> Verify dropdown is visible
> Verify dropdown header: page.getByTestId("lms-center-dropdown-header")
> Verify dropdown title: page.getByTestId("lms-center-dropdown-title")
> Verify title text is "Select Centers"

> Verify at least one center option is available: page.getByTestId(/lms-center-option-/)
> Verify close button is visible: page.getByTestId("close-center-dropdown-button")
> Verify done button is visible: page.getByTestId("done-selecting-centers-button")

column9: list of available centers
column10: close button
column11: and done button. All dropdown elements have correct testIds and are visible.

Title: Verify selecting a single center loads collection requests table.
Description: Validate that selecting one center from the dropdown triggers API call
Scenario: and displays the CollectionRequestTable component with requests data.
Detailed Steps: Positive
Expected Result: Functional
column9:
> Navigate to LMS Requests page
> Wait for page to load (wait for 2000 ms)
> Open center dropdown: page.getByTestId("center-dropdown-button").click()
> Wait for dropdown to open (wait for 500 ms)
> Locate first center option: page.getByTestId(/lms-center-option-/).first()
> Get center name from option: page.getByTestId(/lms-center-option-name-/).first().textContent()
> Click first center option
> Wait for loading overlay (wait for 1000 ms)
> Verify loading overlay appears: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-loading-overlay")
> Verify loading overlay content: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-loading-overlay-content")
> Verify loading spinner: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-loading-overlay-spinner")
> Verify loading message: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-loading-overlay-message")
> Verify message text is "Loading collection requests..."
> Wait for table to load (wait for 3000 ms)
> Verify loading overlay disappears
> Verify empty state disappears: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-empty-state").shouldNotBeVisible()
> Verify table component appears: page.getByTestId("lms-collection-request-table")
> Verify table is visible
> Verify center dropdown label shows selected center name: page.getByTestId("lms-center-dropdown-label")
column10: Selecting a center triggers loading overlay with spinner and message. After API call completes
column13: and CollectionRequestTable component is displayed with requests data. Center dropdown shows selected center name.

Title: Verify selecting multiple centers loads requests from all selected centers.
Description: Validate that selecting multiple centers from the dropdown maintains all selections and loads requests from all selected centers combined.
Detailed Steps:
> Navigate to LMS Requests page
> Wait for page to load (wait for 2000 ms)
> Open center dropdown: page.getByTestId("center-dropdown-button").click()
> Wait for dropdown to open (wait for 500 ms)
> Click first center option: page.getByTestId(/lms-center-option-/).first().click()
> Wait for 500 ms
> Click second center option: page.getByTestId(/lms-center-option-/).nth(1).click()
> Wait for 500 ms
> Verify both centers are selected (checkboxes are checked)
> Click done button: page.getByTestId("done-selecting-centers-button").click()
> Wait for loading overlay (wait for 1000 ms)
> Verify loading overlay appears: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-loading-overlay")
> Wait for table to load (wait for 3000 ms)
> Verify loading overlay disappears
> Verify table component appears: page.getByTestId("lms-collection-request-table")
> Verify center dropdown label shows "2 selected": page.getByTestId("lms-center-dropdown-label")
> Verify table displays requests from both selected centers
Expected Result: Multiple centers can be selected simultaneously. Dropdown shows ""X selected"" where X is the number of selected centers. Table displays requests from all selected centers combined. All selections are maintained.

Title: Verify Select All Centers option selects all available centers.

Expected Result: Select All option selects all available centers. All center checkboxes are checked. Select All option is highlighted. Dropdown label shows total count of selected centers. Table loads requests from all centers.

Title: Verify selecting a user filters requests by that user.
Description: Validate that selecting a specific user from the users panel filters the table to show only requests requested by that selected user.
Detailed Steps:
> Navigate to LMS Requests page
> Select a center (follow steps from LMS-REQ-005)
> Wait for table to load (wait for 3000 ms)
> Open user dropdown: page.getByTestId("user-dropdown-button").click()
> Wait for dropdown to open (wait for 500 ms)
> Expand a role (follow steps from LMS-REQ-010)
> Locate first user in users panel
> Get user name
> Click on the user to select
> Wait for 500 ms
> Verify user checkbox is checked
> Close user dropdown (click outside)
> Wait for table to filter (wait for 2000 ms)
> Verify table still visible: page.getByTestId("lms-collection-request-table")
> Verify user dropdown label shows selected user name: page.getByTestId("lms-user-dropdown-label")
> Verify table rows display only requests requested by selected user
Expected Result: Selecting a user checks the user checkbox. User dropdown label shows selected user name. Table filters to display only requests where requestedBy matches the selected user. Filtering works correctly.

Title: Verify search input accepts text and filters requests by customer name or mobile.

> Wait for table to filter (wait for 2000 ms)
> Verify table still visible: page.getByTestId("lms-collection-request-table")
> Verify table rows display only requests matching search term
> Verify matching is done on customer name or mobile number
Expected Result: Search input accepts text input. Clicking search button triggers filtering. Table filters to show only requests where customer name or mobile number contains the search term. Filtering works correctly and updates table display.

Title: Verify loading overlay appears during initial request fetch.
Description: Validate that loading overlay with spinner and message appears when selecting a center and fetching requests for the first time.
Detailed Steps:
> Navigate to LMS Requests page
> Wait for page to load (wait for 2000 ms)
> Open center dropdown: page.getByTestId("center-dropdown-button").click()
> Wait for dropdown to open (wait for 500 ms)
> Click first center option
> Immediately verify loading overlay appears: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-loading-overlay")
> Verify overlay covers entire screen (fixed inset-0)
> Verify overlay has high z-index
> Verify overlay content: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-loading-overlay-content")
> Verify loading spinner: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-loading-overlay-spinner")
> Verify spinner is animating
> Verify loading message: page.getByTestId("lms-requests-loading-overlay-message")
> Verify message text is "Loading collection requests..."
> Wait for API call to complete (wait for 3000 ms)
> Verify loading overlay disappears
Expected Result: Loading overlay appears immediately when center is selected. Overlay covers entire screen with high z-index. Spinner is visible and animating. Message displays ""Loading collection requests..."". Overlay disappears when API call completes. User cannot interact with page during loading.
